mapper.insert: insert into tbl_borrow_historys (history_id, reader_id, borrow_time, repay_time, renew, overdue, fine) values (#{historyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{borrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{renew,jdbcType=BIT}, #{overdue,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fine,jdbcType=REAL})
mapper.update: update tbl_borrow_historys set reader_id = #{readerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, borrow_time = #{borrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repay_time = #{repayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, renew = #{renew,jdbcType=BIT}, overdue = #{overdue,jdbcType=BIT}, fine = #{fine,jdbcType=REAL} where history_id = #{historyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select history_id, reader_id, borrow_time, repay_time, renew, overdue, fine from tbl_borrow_historys
